name: Blitzkrieg
description: Free version of the mod made for convenient progression in any level you have a commitment to beat or to set progresses on! Inspired and based on Rudder's progression method named "Blitzkrieg"!

show-best-run.name: Show Best-Run
show-best-run.description: If enabled - shows the best run from certain percentage in an Active Stage

show-attempts-for-progress.name: Show Attempts for Progress
show-attempts-for-progress.description: If enabled - shows how many attempts you had in the current level when certain progress was set in an Active Stage

show-pass-amount.name: Show Pass Amount
show-pass-amount.description: If enabled - shows how many times was a certain progress passed in an Active Stage

enable-auto-checker.name: Enable Auto-Checker
enable-auto-checker.description:
If enabled - automatically checks the Check-Box for a certain progress in an Active Stage. It does NOT check the progress that is shorter if you passed it, so if you need to include shorter progresses, make sure you check it by yourself!

For example, if you have progresses: ..60-70, 50-60.., if you pass 50-70, then 50-60 will be CHECKED, but 60-70 WILL NOT, be aware!

rudder-nickname.name: Name for Rudder
rudder-nickname.description: Name that will be displayed in a progress report to Rudder

rudder-color.name: Your Message's Color
rudder-color.description: Color that will be displayed alongside your Name in a progress report to Rudder

rudder-frequency.name: Send Progress to Rudder
rudder-frequency.description: Do you want Rudder to watch your progress? Set-up the frequency!
